post:
Howdy,

I'm posting an OpenVZ i7 VPS here for you today, We're utilizing the OVH network and game server range to provide you with decent DDOS protection for your projects. 

Running on [**i7-4790K**](http://ark.intel.com/products/80807/Intel-Core-i7-4790K-Processor-8M-Cache-up-to-4_40-GHz) with a two to one share ratio to offer good performance for low end pricing.

Spec:

CPU: 1vCPU [**i7-4790K**](http://ark.intel.com/products/80807/Intel-Core-i7-4790K-Processor-8M-Cache-up-to-4_40-GHz)  
RAM: 2GB  
SSD: 10GB  
Connection: D:1Gb / U:250Mb (Shared)  
BW: 1TB  

Price: <del>$7</del> $5 For the life of the order

[Order Link](http://billing.c38.host/index.php?_url=/order/let2gi7) < Use Coupon LET5D at checkout
